name: chapter-marker-buddy
description: A lightweight, hotkey-first Chrome extension for creating timestamped markers on any web video. Perfect for creating YouTube chapters, taking notes during videos, and exporting timestamps in multiple formats.

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.zip: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const archiver=require('archiver'); const archive=archiver('zip'); const stream=fs.createWriteStream('chapter-marker-buddy-v1.0.0.zip'); archive.pipe(stream); archive.directory('dist/', false); archive.finalize();"
scripts.validate: node -e "console.log('Extension validation script - checking manifest and structure'); const manifest=require('./dist/manifest.json'); console.log('âœ“ Manifest valid:', manifest.name, 'v'+manifest.version);"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true}); if(fs.existsSync('*.zip')) fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.zip')).forEach(f=>fs.unlinkSync(f));"
